meta.title: Automotive Artificial Intelligence - AUTYVO AI
meta.description: Discover how AUTYVO's artificial intelligence transforms your vehicle management: predictive analysis, smart notifications, cost optimization.

hero.title: Intelligence at the Service of Your Vehicle
hero.subtitle: AUTYVO uses artificial intelligence to transform your vehicle management into a simple, predictive, and optimized experience.

features.title: How AUTYVO's AI Works For You
features.subtitle: Four technological pillars for intelligent automotive management

items.title: Predictive Analysis
items.details: Our system analyzes your vehicle's mileage and usage conditions to remind you of necessary interventions at the right time, in accordance with manufacturer recommendations.

items.title: Automatic Planning
items.details: The system automatically generates a maintenance calendar based on your vehicle's characteristics and manufacturer recommendations.

items.title: Smart Notifications
items.details: Receive reminders perfectly adapted to your situation: personal calendar, weather conditions, and key deadlines such as technical inspection or insurance.

items.title: Cost Optimization
items.details: The system helps you anticipate and organize all your vehicle-related expenses ‚Äî maintenance, fuel, upcoming interventions ‚Äî and indicates the most relevant times to act.

capabilities.title: Our AI's Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology to simplify your automotive daily life

items.title: Document Recognition
items.description: Scan your invoices and our algorithms automatically extract all key information: date, amount, type of intervention, replaced parts.

items.title: Establishment Verification
items.description: The system automatically verifies garages, maintenance centers, and technical inspection centers to validate the authenticity of your maintenance documents.

items.title: Recommendation Engine
items.description: Based on millions of vehicle data points, our engine suggests the best maintenance actions according to your specific situation.

items.title: Evolution Tracking
items.description: Visualize the evolution of your vehicle's condition and track your maintenance history to make better decisions.

items.title: Anomaly Detection
items.description: The system relies on data from similar vehicles in the automotive fleet to interpret your vehicle's information and alert you as soon as an anomaly or potential risk is detected.

items.title: Lifespan Prediction
items.description: The system estimates the remaining lifespan of your main components (battery, brakes, timing, and other essential elements) based on mileage and manufacturer recommendations.

useCases.title: AI in Action: Practical Cases
useCases.subtitle: Discover how artificial intelligence intervenes concretely in daily life

items.title: Winter Approaching
items.aiAction: AI detects the approach of winter and sends you a notification to check your tires, battery, and antifreeze fluid levels.
items.benefit: You're ready before the first frost

items.title: Technical Inspection
items.scenario: In 2 months, your inspection is due
items.aiAction: The system alerts you 8 weeks in advance and suggests a pre-inspection to correct potential problem points.
items.benefit: Pass inspection on the first try

items.title: Oil Change Mileage
items.aiAction: AI calculates that at your current pace, you'll reach the threshold in 3 weeks and suggests booking an appointment.

items.title: Establishment Verification
items.scenario: You add an invoice from a garage
items.aiAction: The system automatically verifies the establishment, confirms it's an approved center, and certifies the document's authenticity to strengthen your history's value.
